definitions.definition: A sweet or savory but usually spicy condiment , originally from eastern India , made from a variety of fruits and/or vegetables , often containing significant amounts of fresh green or dried red chili peppers .
A style of Indo-Caribbean music from the West Indies , associated especially with Trinidad and Tobago .

main_definition: A sweet or savory but usually spicy condiment , originally from eastern India , made from a variety of fruits and/or vegetables , often containing significant amounts of fresh green or dried red chili peppers . [from 1813]
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A style of Indo-Caribbean music from the West Indies , associated especially with Trinidad and Tobago .
